abstract: Political Memo; Edward M Kennedy Institute for the United States Senate, set to open in Boston, has full-scale replica of Senate chamber as its centerpiece in bid to inspire public and educate them about workings of Senate; chamber provides immersive learning experience by allowing visitors to participate in mock Senate sessions.
lead_paragraph: Featuring a replica chamber, a new center aims to remind the public that an institution now known more for filibusters and dysfunction than for leadership and debate can again become a venue of national consensus.

headline.main: In Bid to Inspire Faith in Senate, Kennedy Institute Has the Floor
headline.print_headline: In Bid to Inspire Faith in Senate, Kennedy Institute Has the Floor

snippet: Featuring a replica chamber, a new center aims to remind the public that an institution now known more for filibusters and dysfunction than for leadership and debate can again become a venue of national consensus.
